item.title: Silent Payments
item.description: Josi gave us a great introduction to silent payments in this conversation. We talked about the history of similar efforts, benefits and drawbacks, how it works, status of the project, adoption path, and lots more.

item.title: Covenants Part 2
item.description: Continuing our discussion from our first call, we dove into how covenants might play out in scenarios around chaining transactions, payment pools, and cold lightning channels. We made good progress, but also still have questions.

item.title: Covenants
item.description: We dig into what covenants are, how they work, and the different use cases.
